data.content: Handoff: Replaced subtle plain-text "Tracker: Beads" display with prominent green pill badges (CircleDot icon + label) in both settings-repos-section and repo-registry UIs. The badge sits inline next to each repo name, styled green for known trackers and muted for unknown. Uses existing IssueTrackerType infrastructure (getIssueTrackerLabel). Commit: ee7eec9. Quality gates: tsc clean, 691 tests pass, 0 lint errors in changed files.
